titles: A True narrative of the proceedings at the Hertford-assizes, this instant July 1676 setting forth the tryal of the person that attempted to fire the town of Hodsdon, with the punishment inflicted on him : the tryal, examination, and confession of two high-way-men, and one pick-pocket, there condemned to die : and all other remarkable occurances : published for general satisfaction.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Criminal procedure --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
